comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frida_St%C3%A9enhoff (in Swedish) "Helga Frideborg (Frida), Maria Steen Hoffmann, born Wadström December 11, 1865 in Klara parish in Stockholm, died June 22, 1945, was a Swedish writer and debater." -- via Google Translate

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of January 16, 1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10711FB3E5F17738... lists her as a speaker at the final luncheon of the peace conference to which Henry Ford took U.S. delegates.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Google Translate oddly translates Steenhoff to Steen Hoffman.
